title: Understanding Entropy
text: Entropy is a measure of the randomness or disorder in a system. A perfectly crystalline solid at absolute zero represents a state of perfect order.

title: Entropy Change with Temperature
text: As the temperature of a crystalline solid increases from absolute zero, its atoms start to vibrate. Do these vibrations increase or decrease the disorder in the system?

title: Predicting the Entropy Change
text: Consider if increasing the temperature from absolute zero to room temperature makes the system more ordered or disordered. What happens to the entropy?

title: Final Prediction
text: Based on the changes observed when heating a crystalline solid from absolute zero to room temperature, what is the sign of the system's entropy change?
